name: Nodame Cantabile: Dream Orchestra
overview: This is the first work in the "Symphony Lover's Dream Series" to land on the Wii. The game starts with a completely original story and takes you into a different world of "Symphony Lover's Dream". The songs appearing in the game are all well-known songs, this time we will use Wiimote to perform somatosensory performances! And it supports 4 people to play together at the same time!
